00013 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00014    Selector * variable; \
00015    if ((variable = new Selector) == NULL) \
00016       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00017    if (area != NULL) \
00018       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00019    if (groupField != NULL) \
00020       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable);
00021 
00022 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py) \
00023    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00024    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height) \
00027    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00028    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00029       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00030 
00031 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height) \
00032    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00033    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00034    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00035       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00036 
00037 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00038    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00039    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00040    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00041 
00042 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00043    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00044    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00045    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00046    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00047 
00048 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_SM(variable, area, groupField, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00049    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00050    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00051    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00052       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00053 
00054 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_PSM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00055    GLAZIERY_SELECTOR(variable, area, groupField) \
00056    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00057    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00058    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00059       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00060 
00061 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_TEXTOPTION(optionVariable, textElementVariable, selector, text, selected) \
00062    Selector::Option * optionVariable; \
00063    if ((optionVariable = new Selector::Option) == NULL) \
00064       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00065    selector->appendOption(optionVariable); \
00066    TextElement * textElementVariable; \
00067    if ((textElementVariable = new TextElement) == NULL) \
00068       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00069    optionVariable->appendElement(textElementVariable); \
00070    textElementVariable->setText(text); \
00071    if (selected) \
00072       selector->setSelection(optionVariable);
00073 
00074 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_IMAGEOPTION(optionVariable, imageElementVariable, selector, image, selected) \
00075    Selector::Option * optionVariable; \
00076    if ((optionVariable = new Selector::Option) == NULL) \
00077       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00078    selector->appendOption(optionVariable); \
00079    ImageElement * imageElementVariable; \
00080    if ((imageElementVariable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00081       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00082    optionVariable->appendElement(imageElementVariable); \
00083    imageElementVariable->setImageId(imageId); \
00084    if (selected) \
00085       selector->setSelection(optionVariable);
00086 
00087 #define GLAZIERY_SELECTOR_IMAGETEXTOPTION(optionVariable, imageElementVariable, textElementVariable, \
00088    selector, image, text, selected) \
00089    Selector::Option * optionVariable; \
00090    if ((optionVariable = new Selector::Option) == NULL) \
00091       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00092    selector->appendOption(optionVariable); \
00093    ImageElement * imageElementVariable; \
00094    if ((imageElementVariable = new ImageElement) == NULL) \
00095       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00096    optionVariable->appendElement(imageElementVariable); \
00097    imageElementVariable->setImage(image); \
00098    TextElement * textElementVariable; \
00099    if ((textElementVariable = new TextElement) == NULL) \
00100       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00101    optionVariable->appendElement(textElementVariable); \
00102    textElementVariable->setText(text); \
00103    if (selected) \
00104       selector->setSelection(optionVariable);
00105
